answers.answer: The best way to increase your supply is by nursing around the clock. I have never used the tea or any other supplements to increase my supply, but I would always run something like this past your doctor. I am going to assume you have an Endocrinologist that you can ask, correct?

question: I am pregnant and due Feb. 1.  With my 3 yr old, i wasn't able to breastfed because I was not producing enough milk. So I was told to drink mother's milk tea and eat oatmeal(don't like oatmeal, but love oatmeal cookies) to help increase my milk supply by the time this baby is born.  My question is, i am type 2 diabetic. i was wondering if the mother's milk tea will affect my diabetes. And does the tea really help increase your milk supply?
title: Mother's milk tea and diabetes
